questionData.passage: The witness was asked to _______ exactly what she saw at the scene of the accident.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子要求證人準確地說出她在事故現場看到了什麼。選項 D「describe」意為描述、形容，最符合語境。選項 A「invent」意為發明、虛構，選項 B「forget」意為忘記，選項 C「exaggerate」意為誇大，這些都不適合用於證人如實陳述所見的情況。

questionData.passage: The company is planning to _______ its operations into new international markets next year.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子描述公司計劃明年將業務擴展到新的國際市場。選項 D「expand」意為擴展、擴大，最符合語義。選項 A「contract」意為收縮、縮小，選項 B「restrict」意為限制，選項 C「shrink」意為縮小、減少，這些詞的意思都與「擴展業務」相反。

questionData.passage: He was very _______ about his chances of winning the competition, despite strong opponents.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子說即使面對強勁的對手，他對贏得比賽的機會仍然如何。選項 D「confident」意為有信心的，與「despite strong opponents」（儘管有強勁對手）形成對比，表示他對自己很有信心。選項 A「doubtful」意為懷疑的，選項 B「hesitant」意為猶豫的，選項 C「uncertain」意為不確定的，這三個詞都表示缺乏信心或猶豫，不符合語境。

questionData.passage: It is _______ for students to submit their assignments by Friday morning.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子說明學生必須在週五早上提交作業。選項 D「mandatory」意為強制性的、必須履行的，最符合語境。選項 A「optional」意為可選的，選項 B「suggested」意為被建議的，選項 C「voluntary」意為自願的，這三個詞都表示非必須的或自願的，與句子中「必須提交」的意思不符。
